values.description:
Supplying teachers and support staff to the schools of Sussex Sussex Teachers are the leading local independent supply teaching agency in Brighton & Hove, East Sussex and West Sussex. Since 2007, we have offered a reliable and cost effective local supply service specialising in the temporary and permanent recruitment of qualified teachers, teaching assistants and support staff. 

Our experienced consultants have a proven track record in their specialist sector having dealt with the Sussex schools and teachers for many years. We pride ourselves on our flexibility so whether you are looking for a year 5 teaching job in Lewes, a Science teaching job in Worthing, a teaching assistant job in Eastbourne, or a supply teaching job in Brighton, our experienced consultants will help find the right role for you.
values.name: Sussex Teachers

values.description:
Amigos is a multi-cultural preschool in the Brunswick neighbourhood of Hove which aims to enable children from different nationalities to interact and play together harmoniously.

We have been established for over 13 years and have a vast knowledge of the way young children learn in a friendly setting (and we know a few different languages too!) We encourage positive images of people from all ethnic and cultural groups and people with and without disabilities. We believe it is vital for young children to learn about different customs, religious and cultural beliefs and disabilities.

By encouraging understanding and respect of other people in our community, we hope to promote a more tolerant and harmonious society. We have recently welcomed Sudanese, Indian, Bengali, Saudi, Egyptian, Japanese, French, Bulgarian & Slovakian children as well as those of British origin.

Songs, stories, food and shared festivals and customs have been explored and enjoyed by all. In such a richly diverse environment, the children experience new ideas, develop skills, gain confidence, improve communication skills, make friends and learn from each other. Most importantly, they have fun!
values.name: Amigos Preschool

values.description:
We are a progressive law firm based in Brighton & Hove with an approachable team of lawyers who pride ourselves in developing and sustaining strong, long term client relationships. Our reputation is built on the provision of accessible but affordable and high quality legal services to both individuals and business clients.
​
We offer all our clients:-
﻿
• A thorough and clear approach to your matter - to help you understand all the relevant considerations and set your objectives;
﻿
• Our experience and expertise – committed to achieving the most favourable outcomes and goals for you;
﻿
• Our integrity and independence - which is devoted to  protecting your legal rights and best interests;
﻿
• A prompt, pragmatic and solutions driven service - as our clients testify;
﻿
• Direct access to an experienced solicitor - throughout your case.
​
​﻿Contact us at any time, for a friendly, no-obligation enquiry about our services.
values.name: GoodLaw Solicitors
4A LAW LAWYERS
values.description:
4A LAW LAWYERS provide legal services in business, corporate immigration, private immigration, company commercial, insolvency, litigation, property and debt collection matters. 

4A LAW LAWYERS serve many varied clients, UK national and international clients from across the globe. From Mexico, to Canada, Australia, New Zealand to Saudi Arabia and the Middle East to Europe (western and eastern) from a base in the Gatwick diamond, Crawley West Sussex.

Strategically founded as a virtual law firm to serve the Business Immigration Property and Litigation needs of international business as well as private clients. Many business clients are based in various parts of the world and 4A LAW LAWYERS are fast becoming the choice business lawyers of those based in London, Brighton and Hove and the surrounding areas.

Why do business with 4A LAW LAWYERS? Simple. 4A LAW LAWYERS operate fixed fees, without the usually high costs associated with premises. The lawyers are time served with international legal organisations and regional practices. Collectively the lawyers have over 30 years of experience and success built through client service, referrals and an enviable reputation.

As a unique and innovative leading law firm, 4A LAW provide fixed fee assistance with the 4A’s of law: Advice, Applications, Advocacy and Appeals. If you would like more information contact 4A LAW litigation lawyers or email info@4alaw.com for personalised legal advice.

JooJoo Creative is a boutique web design and development agency based in the heart of Brighton and Hove. Working with some of the most talented designers and developers, we create beautiful branding, engaging websites and e-commerce stores that convert traffic to sales. We Design. We Build. We Market (you).
values.name: JooJoo Creative
Added Bytes
values.description:
Based in Brighton and Hove, UK, Added Bytes are specialists in web development, as happy planning and building you a system from the ground up as adding a module to one of the Open Source platforms we work with every day. 

We take care of all parts of the website building process, including planning and wireframes, branding and design, development, marketing, testing, deployment, hosting and website management.

We have buckets of experience with the major open source e-commerce and CMS platforms, including Magento, MODX, Drupal, OpenCart, Prestashop and Wordpress, and including installation, themeing, custom module development, hosting and even platform upgrades.  

Get in touch to find out more!

Located 11 kilometres south-west of the Adelaide Central Business District, the City of Holdfast Bay is regarded as a progressive and lively seaside community, and its rich heritage, sandy beaches, and exciting attractions have earned it the reputation as Adelaide’s favourite coastal destination.

With a footprint of just under 14 square kilometres, the City includes the suburbs of Brighton, North Brighton, South Brighton,Glenelg, Glenelg East, Glenelg North, Glenelg South, Hove,Kingston Park, Seacliff, Seacliff Park and Somerton Park.

The City is predominantly residential, with thriving retail precincts in Glenelg, Brighton and along Brighton Road
and a light industrial base at Somerton Park. The 2011 Commonwealth Census data shows a residential population of 34,606, of which 21.6% were over the age of 65, and 36.9% are under the age of 34. Comparisons with the 2006
Census shows a slight decline in the number of older residents and an increase in the numbers of younger residents.
values.name: City of Holdfast Bay

values.description:
Who are we? 

Talbot Fashions LLP was established in 1980 by twin brothers Anthony and Robert Talbot, and the company has grown to become one of the UK’s leading suppliers of fashion accessories to the trade.

We operate from a modern warehousing facility which is based on the South Coast in the happening seaside city of Brighton and Hove, from where we despatch our products throughout the UK, Europe and the rest of the world. All orders are despatched from our large stocks and usually reach their destination within 1-2 working days of receiving the order. (UK)

If you would like to visit our warehouse, then please call us in advance to arrange on 01273 776415. Parking is available. 
  
What do we do? 

We specialise in the sourcing and wholesaling of fashion jewellery and accessories for all age groups and both sexes. We currently hold almost 1000 different product lines, which are customised, packaged and bar-coded.

We supply independent fashion retailers, gift shops, multiple chain stores, party planners, wholesalers, online sellers, market traders and others.

Our team of nationwide sales representatives are able to present and give advice on our entire range, including any new additions that might otherwise not be viewed until the next catalogue.

We produce 2 colour catalogues a year, laid out in an easy to order format.

All orders are processed and despatched usually within 1 working day of receipt of your order.
values.name: Talbot Fashions

values.description:
Since 2002, Quid has produced an array of books on popular culture, humour and reference, and we continue to grow our business across a range of international markets.

We also invest heavily in product development, with innovative projects in history, mathematics, science, natural history, the arts and philosophy. A broad range of our new presentations can be viewed on request and in our catalogue.

Based in the cosmopolitan seaside city of Brighton and Hove, we are a small team with big ambitions. Although we are represented throughout North America, Europe, Asia and Australia, much of our creative input is sourced locally, employing the extraordinary talent available in our highly creative community.
values.name: Quid Publishing

values.description:
We offer Clinical Advanced Massage, Myofascial Release, Osteopathy, Acupuncture, Yoga and relaxing holistic treatments from our centre in Brighton & Hove.
From booking to aftercare, our service is professional, relaxed and caring. All our therapists are trained in advanced techniques to get the best result for you. We are open late most evenings, up to 9pm, and offer an Online Booking system so you can check availability and make confirmed appointments 24 hours a day.
values.name: Natural Balance Therapies

values.description:

We help consumers save money when they shop at independent businesses, and help small businesses through our advertising, marketing and social platforms.

Contact us today to find out about becoming a partner.

The Claimed Intermediate is an online Structure Searchable database which covers Process Patents for Named Marketed Pharmaceutical Drugs. The Database combines Current Awareness with Historical Records.

The Principal, Eddie Kehoe, has been searching, examining, abstracting and interpreting patent specifications for almost 40 years. Initially a Chemist, Eddie has covered most subject areas but has been mainly concerned with Pharmaceutical Patents over the last 20 years.

Big Local App Surrey & Sussex
values.description:
The Big Local App, The smartphone app packed full of local news, information, entertainment and business listings has now launched in Brighton & Hove! with many more for Surrey & Sussex coming soon.
 
The app is available from the App Store for iPhone and iPod touch, and from the Android Market for all Android phones, so a wealth of local information is right at your fingertips.

The Big Local App contains a business directory containing a wealth of businesses, many with their own mini-apps which allow you to access detailed information including products and services, opening times and location maps. There's also a direct link to local cinema times, local news from the BBC and all your local council information.
 
To start using the app today, use the download links to the left for your iPhone or Android smartphone or visit the App Store or Market directly from your device and search for BigLocalApp!

Once downloaded you can easily select other 'Big Local Apps' throughout the UK!

Contact us to get your company listed!

Make It So Production Realisation is a Theatre Arts and Events Company supplying Production Expertise in Live and Recorded Production, Events and Exhibitions.

A selection of the British Arts Companies our team has been involved with include; The Anvil Arts Trust in Basingstoke, Theatreworks Company in Malvern, The Connaught Theatre in Worthing and The Bath Festival in Somerset. We have also worked alongside other companies such as MCCGLC Design and Exhibitions, Parexel Medical Marketing and Brighton & Hove Museums and Education.

Our team has also worked overseas at Stage Door Manor in New York, Trafalgar Studios on Tour in New York and The Great Entertainment Company in Dubai. Most recently we have worked with global organisations such a Pfizer Inc., Bayer Healthcare and Baxter.

We can produce large scale Productions incorporating your own artists and staff or provide the entire artistic service.

We can provide your entire audience with Workshops, Master Classes and Tutorials.

Describe your dream show - let us ‘Make It So!’
values.name: Make It So
Lenderise
values.description:
Lenderise lets you make money by lending things you have, or save money by borrowing the things you need, all in the Brighton and Hove area.

It can be anything from a spare lawnmower, a boat, or maybe some DJ decks. It could be skills at assembling furniture or cooking for someone’s dinner party. You can list it all, or find it all, on Lenderise.

Football1x2 is the customer facing arm of F1x2Games, where all the games can be played in a live environment. 

F1x2Games are a UK based supplier of Virtual Football and general fixed odds gambling games to international gaming sites. 
Our main office is in the UK tech-hub of Brighton & Hove, known lovingly as Silicon Beach. 
We are a proudly independent company and offer a different gaming perspective to the mainstream. 
The company has been around since 2003 and is still developing innovative fixed odds gaming products for gaming sites of all sizes. 
We have a team of developers and graphic artists who produce flash and HTML5 based games that interact with our server-side gaming engines.
Our flagship offering is the suite of virtual football products that simulate the action of the world’s most popular soccer leagues and tournaments.
We also develop a variety of other games that you can see on the products page of the website www.f1x2games.com
We have long term relationships with the biggest customer facing sites so deliver our products and we also regularly integrate with smaller and start-up sites. 
Our integration team is experienced at quickly delivering link-ups to a variety of player wallet solutions. 

We are now moving to a new phase where we plan to have a full casino suite of all the games you know, plus some exciting new ones, by Q1 2013. We will then move straight on to deliver our first suite of HTML5 games by mid-2013.
values.name: Football1x2

values.description:
Road2Result was founded in 2004 by Bert van Hove. 
After 10 years of Microsoft Training and Consultancy experience, in the field as well as in management, it was time to take this experience to a next level and start an independent consultancy company.

Road2Result offers a wide range of ICT services, 
it does not only design networks, it also deploys and maintains them.

Next to consultancy skills our engineers also have the skills to educate the people that have to maintain your network in your day to day operations.

Our goal is to build a trust-relationship with the customers in such a way that Road2Result will take care of its entrusted tasks so that we can free up time for our customers and allow them to focus on their core business, while we worry about the network.
values.name: Road2Result
